history.summary: Agent Marketplace Interface completed with all 8 deliverables - UI foundation for 100+ agent ecosystem
history.completion_message: Successfully delivered comprehensive Agent Marketplace Interface transforming AIOS v2 into extensible platform ecosystem. Created production-ready components: MarketplaceInterface, AgentCard, MarketplaceFilters, InstalledAgentsManager. Supports agent discovery, installation, management, ratings, reviews, developer portal, revenue sharing. Full TypeScript coverage, responsive design, coordinated with CB's backend APIs. Ready for user acquisition and ecosystem growth.
history.strategic_value: Transforms AIOS v2 from single-purpose tool to comprehensive platform ecosystem, enabling 100+ agent marketplace with 70/25/5 revenue model

history.summary: AIOS v2 Product Strategy & User Experience Coordination completed with all 8 deliverables
history.completion_message: Successfully coordinated complete AIOS v2 MVP delivery creating cohesive, user-centric product ready for acquisition and growth. Delivered: User Documentation Hub, Value Proposition Framework, Agent Marketplace Strategy, Analytics Framework, Post-MVP Roadmap, and End-to-End Product Validation. All strategic frameworks completed with implementation plans.

history.summary: Sprint infrastructure setup completed with all deliverables
history.completion_message: Successfully completed sprint infrastructure setup including task templates (outbox.json format), progress tracking system (.sprint/progress.json), sprint workflow documentation (PHASE_6.15_SPRINT_PLAN.md, autonomy guidelines), and helper scripts (agent monitor v2, metrics tools, validation scripts). All infrastructure operational.
